description: A storm surge ruins rice paddies on Spain's Ebro River and beach resorts are damaged.
title: Storm Gloria floods major river delta in eastern Spain
title_page: Storm Gloria floods major river delta in eastern Spain - BBC News
maintext: The mayor of the delta region, Llu¨ªs Soler, said "we've never had anything like this before". Seawater has flooded about 30sq km (12sq miles) of rice plants.
